qas.question: Why do some police acts limit when police can interfere without court orders?

answers.text: To ensure that the police would not interfere in the regular competencies of the courts of law

qas.question: What could be impeded without police interference?

answers.text: the realization of the private right

qas.question: How could police help the owner when a restaurant guest doesn't pay because their wallet got stolen?

answers.text: establish a restaurant guest's identity and forward it to the innkeeper

plausible_answers.text: To ensure that the police would not interfere in the regular competencies of the courts of law

qas.question: Why do all police acts limit when police can interfere without court orders?

plausible_answers.text: To ensure that the police would not interfere in the regular competencies of the courts of law

qas.question: Why do some police acts limit when police can aid without court orders?

plausible_answers.text: the realization of the private right

qas.question: What could be unimpeded without police interference?

plausible_answers.text: the realization of the private right

qas.question: What couldn't be impeded without police interference?

plausible_answers.text: establish a restaurant guest's identity and forward it to the innkeeper

qas.question: How couldn't police help the owner when a restaurant guest doesn't pay because their wallet got stolen?

context: In contrast, the police are entitled to protect private rights in some jurisdictions. <a0_0><b3_0><b4_0>To ensure that the police would not interfere in the regular competencies of the courts of law<b4_0/><b3_0/><a0_0/>, some police acts require that the police may only interfere in such cases where protection from courts cannot be obtained in time, and where, without interference of the police, <a1_0><b5_0><b6_0>the realization of the private right<b6_0/><b5_0/><a1_0/> would be impeded. This would, for example, allow police to <a2_0><b7_0>establish a restaurant guest's identity and forward it to the innkeeper<b7_0/><a2_0/> in a case where the guest cannot pay the bill at nighttime because his wallet had just been stolen from the restaurant table.
